channel.title: Climbing logbook on Tobias Breitwieser
channel.description: Recent content in Climbing logbook on Tobias Breitwieser

item.title: 25.07.2017 Ötztal Wildspitze (try)
item.description: On the 25.07.2017 my Partner (Daniel) went out to summit the Wildspitze in Vent (Ötztal, Austria) over the normal route through Mittelkarjoch. Our base was the Breslauer Hut. Weather conditions where far from good with -2C to -5C, a chill temperature of -15C, snow, clouds and heavy winds. On the Taschachferner the visibility was partly down to a few meters and no tracks were visible. In this conditions I broke into a not visible crevasse and hit my knee hard a few meters before the end of the glacier.

item.title: 10.07.2016 Chamonix Petite Aiguille Verte
item.description: On 10.07.2016 Iain and I have done Petite Aiguille Verte over the Northwest Ridge.
